title: Demolitionist
summaries: The Demolitionist is an NPC vendor that will spawn once the following criteria have been met:

• There is an empty house.
  • The player has an explosive in the inventory (items stored in storage items like chests, or portable storages like the Piggy Bank do not count).
  • The Merchant is present.
These requirements only apply to the initial spawning. If the Demolitionist is killed, he will automatically respawn after some time.
If the Demolitionist is killed, he will only respawn if the above requirements are met again.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Legacy tModLoader version]</linked><linked> Legacy tModLoader version</linked>, the Demolitionist will lob <linked>Grenades</linked> at nearby enemies to defend himself, which deal 20 / <linked>30</linked> / <linked>35</linked> damage at the start of the game.

Moreover, on the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Legacy tModLoader version]</linked><linked> Legacy tModLoader version</linked>, <linked>NPCs</linked> including the Demolitionist will gain <linked>various stat increases</linked> as the player progresses.
